Footers

Footer specification

Footers vary from product to product and should follow the guidelines set out in this styleguide and the One Wiley Brand Guidelines.

To see an example footer in a full-width page context, please click here.

There are specific requirements for the copyright strapline, please click here for more information.

All Wiley footers should reflect this specification before the end of 2015.

Corporate Brand

Toggle: Notes Code
  • The full www.wiley.com footer
  • Please note that the copyright strapline DOES NOT include a link to the Wiley privacy policy. Instead, the link is included in the link table.

Wiley Brand

Toggle: Notes Code
  • The footer should be presented within the style of the product's individual guidelines, whilst still respecting the One Wiley visual language
  • The example below is respective of the Dummies.com design
Copyright Â© 2000-2015 by John Wiley & Sons, Inc., or related companies. All rights reserved.
Review our privacy policy.
<div class="footer-base footer-base--black nodeco">
        	<div class="footer-base__content">
        		<div class="copyright"><a href="http://www.wiley.com/go/copyright">Copyright Â© 2000-2015</a> by <a href="http://www.wiley.com">John Wiley & Sons, Inc.</a>, or related companies. All rights reserved.<br>Review our <a href="http://www.wiley.com/go/privacy">privacy policy</a>.</div>

Wiley Products And Services

Toggle: Notes Code
  • For use on sites similar to WileyPLUS, Wiley Online Library, etc.
  • The colors used for the dotted line, crescent, and arrow can be a combination of colours from the One Wiley secondary color palette

An example

Wiley Online Library
  • Browse Publications
  • Browse by Subject
  • Author Resources
  • About us
  • Help
  • Contact Us
  • Agents
  • Advertisers
  • Media
  • Privacy
  • Cookies
  • Terms & Conditions
  • Site Map
Copyright Â© 2000-2015 by John Wiley & Sons, Inc., or related companies. All rights reserved.
Review our privacy policy.
<div class="footer--product">
        	<div class="footer--product__content">
        		<div class="footer--product__col footer--product__col--brand">
        			<span><strong>Wiley Online Library</strong></span>
        		</div>

        			<ul>
        				<li>Browse Publications</li>

        			<ul>
        				<li>About us</li>

        				<li>Agents</li>
        				<li>Advertisers</li>

        				<li>Media</li>

        </div>

Partnership Cochrane

Toggle: Notes Code
  • For use on websites where the Wiley partner's branding takes precedence over Wiley's and Wiley requires some recognition for the product
  • Please note that the exact content in the footer will be subject to the requirements set out by Wiley and the Partner
Cochrane footer portion
  • Browse Publications
  • Browse by Subject
  • Advertisers & Agents
  • Contact Us
  • Help & Support
  • Terms & Conditions
Copyright Â© 2000-2015 by John Wiley & Sons, Inc., or related companies. All rights reserved.
Review our privacy policy.
